posts.post_content:
Hello - I have well over (200) T206, SGC/PSA graded, listed buy-it-now on Ebay under ID "peekenterprises".  To celebrate the start of the holiday shopping season, I will discount any/all T206 cards listed by 15% if/when purchased "DIRECT".  Shipping is free and I will accept Paypal at NO additional charge.

Just send me an email on any card(s) you want and I will send you a Paypal invoice reflecting a 15% discount.  Cards will be removed from Ebay upon payment.  

This sale/discount is for buyers in the USA only.  I will offer a discounted price to international buyers upon request.

Email - [url]peekenterprisesnc@gmail.com[/url]

or - [url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]


Thanks and Happy Holidays !
